Articles.Content:
Hi,

My name is Robert Chappell. I am from London, UK. I like to say hello to all members.

Hello Onyourbike, and welcome to the forum!

Glad to have you aboard.  I'm sure you'll enjoy your time in our fine little corner of the internet.

Happy landings!

Good day to you Mr Chappell!

Stick around, chime in, and post the stuff you do and / or build. Don't be shy, KSP is like... umm.. pudding! When it's good it's good, but when it's bad it's still good.
Welcome to the friendly KSP community, KSP is a awesome game, so hopefully you have fun playing it!
